response.overview: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.
response.tagline: Sometimes perfect strangers make the best friends.
response.title: Mary and Max

titles.title: Mary & Max - oder: Schrumpfen Schafe, wenn es regnet?
